thread.title: Women race in high heels in Paris
thread.title_full: Women race in high heels in Paris

title: Women race in high heels in Paris
text:
Women race in high heels in Paris 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
Women have put their best feet forward and raced in shoes with more than 8cm-high heels in 60 meters track in the 2015 High Heel Race in Paris. The race is hosted by Sarenza, a French e-Commerce company specializing in the online sale of shoes and accessories. 
The company is celebrating its 10th anniversary. Contestants are chosen from 220,000 applicants, and divided into 8 groups. The winning team gets free high heels from the company for 10 years. Related Videos
